author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for examples of in-basket, assessment center exercises for HR jobs at the Technician level.  Your examples/documents/resources are appreciated!
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org 
888-468-6450
480-231-3538 Text
title: In-basket/Assessment Center Exercises
